title: TEDxUWASalon: Life After Debt
blurb: TEDxUWA & UWA Business School presents the Life After Debt Workshop
description:
### Overview

The Life After Debt Salon, hosted by TEDxUWA in conjunction with the UWA Business School is dedicated to developing the skills you need to succeed in the world after university.

Event starting at 5pm

---

### Tickets

Tickets are available online at: [https://www.trybooking.com/VDMJ](https://www.trybooking.com/VDMJ)

**Member**: $20

**Non-member**: $25
